A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: wow I made this account just to make this review. Im dumbfounded  I can't believe how much they ruined Star Wars and made a complete joke out of it\, you can tell buy Mark Hamill's facial expression at the end of the premire even he thinks wtf. There are so many things wrong with this film\, some scenes are just utter disrespect to the ideas on what Star Wars was built on. After this film they really killed the specialness of it coming back. TFA wasn't perfect but they could have built on it\, with this film I was so disappointed and honestly felt trolled if I could leave 0 stars I would.
